gameDetails.name: Stonespine Architects: Shrines and Fountains Mini Expansion
gameDetails.description:
Mini expansion containing 7 new chamber cards with new abilities.

Chamber types: Some chamber cards in this mini-expansion are both stone and cave type. During final scoring, each chamber card with multiple chamber types must be scored as either stone or cave, but not both.

Rules: Each card in this mini expansion contains a shrine or fountain at its center, which does not count towards the limit of four elements per chamber. Players may perform its effect once, immediately after placing the chamber.

Fountain: Move a market token or secret passage token to another chamber. Do not exceed four elements in a single chamber.

Shrine: Swap the position of and two chamber cards in the player's dungeon. Any market tokens on the card also move. Secret passage tokens do not.
